p.s: The question is how it is important for the UK's future prosperity and global standing to learn languages.
I am the opinion that it is important to learn more languages and can join me to John Worne's position.
If you learn new languages you get only positive things, advantages.
The only bad thing or disadvantage to learn languages is, that it is hard work and needs a lot of your time and effort.
But this is the only disadvantage.
But if we look at the advantages, we have lots of things to say.
People like employers have a better appearance of you and you can do more jobs.
Today we live in a multicultural world, in which in all countries are tourists or people who does not speak the same languages like us.
So first it has very much of importance for our communication with people in jobs, freetime or to help somebody for a way, they want to couplete.
An otherAnother point is that you need foreign languages or better to say English almost in all jobs.
As employee in the hotel, hospital, police, taxi, airport and always in the market.
In our completely life we need a second language or more.
The communication won very much of importance and helps us almost in all things we do.
So the learning of languages gives you a better appearance and helps to do your work better and develop new things in cooperation for your country.
All in all it has no bad effects to learn foreign languages.
It brings you only positive things.
You reach much of success, which helps you in your life.
